page_start.title: Setup PIN to protect your Data

page_pin_generated.title: We've generated a PIN for you
page_pin_generated.description: This PIN will enrypt your Criptext database

keep_it.title: Keep it
keep_it.description: PIN will be saved in your Keychain and you won't need to enter it each time you start Criptext

page_pin_new.title: Create New PIN
page_pin_new.description: This PIN will encrypt your Criptext database so no other apps can read your emails.

page_pin_saved.title: Save your recovery key
page_pin_saved.description: If you forget your PIN, this recovery key will be your only way in. Save it in where you won't forget it.

checkbox.title: Don't require PIN on startup
checkbox.description: Your PIN will be saved in your keychain so you don't have to enter it every time you start Criptext.
